title: ID please, sans serif seen in Hotline magazine 2010, thanks x
content:
Unknown Sans Serif

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [man.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100909055354/http:/typophile.com/files/man_4.jpg) | 131.43 KB |
author: andrew_dranfield

comments.content: Don't have much info on this sorry, sans serif seen in Hotline magazine, thanx

The headline is [Garage Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100909055354/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/garage_gothic_black_ot/?&sample_text=MAN%E2%80%99S%20WORLD&sample_size=96&update=0) by Tobias Frere-Jones — unlike the article text and the subheading. In case you would like to have them identified too, I recommend uploading a larger sample.
